name: Air Hogs Connect: Mission Drone
description:
**PLEASE NOTE: This app is optimized for tablets and is compatible with:
- iPad 4th generation and greater
- iPad Mini 2 and greater
- iPad Pro
- iPhone 5S and greater
- iPod Touch 6th generation

*This app requires the physical Mission Drone and tracking mat from Spin Master.
*This app requires BLE and a persistent Internet connection for the full experience.

Air Hogs Connect: Mission Drone: The Gamified Future of RC. The award winning Augmented Reality Game of the year mixes the worlds of physical RC and augmented reality. Players command the drone inside a fun virtual game.


Features:

• Air Hogs Connect puts players in the cockpit as pilot of the Mission Drone
• Save the world under attack by alien forces – extinguish fires, save civilians, and deploy the Commando into action!
• Command a team of heroes: the Engineer, Firefighter and Commando
• Explore innovative structured RC play within endless AR game missions
• Perform your best streak score and compete with friends on leader-boards
• Fly through the Financial District, Downtown, and The Harbor
• Rank up your Mission Drone unlocking upgrades and competitive advantages
• Sharpen your skills and earn power ups in The Danger Dome simulation mode
• The HQ offers “builder” and “level-up” style play with over 40 upgrades
• Craft Alien Technologies for special abilities and weaponry
• Weekly challenges that reward your allegiance
• Experience the world’s best hover technology!

SPIN MASTER:
